hero.title: Track INR & manage warfarin dosing — on your device.
hero.lead: INR Mate keeps your data on your iPhone. No accounts, no cloud sync, and no tracking. Set local reminders, log INR results, and export PDF/CSV when you need to share.

i1.title: On‑device privacy
i1.desc: Everything stays on your iPhone. We don’t collect your data.

i2.title: Local reminders
i2.desc: Schedule dose reminders with iOS notifications — no push, no accounts.

i3.title: INR logging & trends
i3.desc: Record INR readings and see trends over time with your target range.

i4.title: Flexible dosing
i4.desc: Fixed, alternating, or weekly top‑up schedules with manual overrides.

i5.title: Export when needed
i5.desc: Create PDF/CSV summaries to share with your care team.

i6.title: Health app (optional)
i6.desc: Integrate with HealthKit if you choose — with explicit permissions.

summary.title: Privacy at a glance
summary.data: Data collected by the developer: None.
summary.analytics: Analytics/Crash reporting: None sent to us (Apple may provide aggregated diagnostics if you’ve opted in).
summary.storage: Where your data lives: On your device. iCloud/Health are governed by Apple’s policies.
summary.notifications: Notifications: Local (on‑device) reminders only. No remote push, no device tokens.
summary.note: This translation is for convenience only. The English policy below is the official version.
